unittitle_ssm: Photographs of the house at 135 Joralemon Street in Brooklyn Heights
abstract_ssm: The Photographs of the house at 135 Joralemon Street in Brooklyn Heights consist of six black-and-white photographic prints showing exterior views of the wooden-frame Federal-style house located in the Brooklyn Heights neighborhood. The photographs focus on the front porch of the house and its decorative cast-iron grillwork that dates from the mid-19th century.
